title: Who are some good mid laners for ranked 5s

replies.body: I hate saying it, but I will anyway. Look at the pros and see what they play. They are essentially ranked 5's and are picked for a reason.

I like to play {{champion:82}} in the mid lane. He counters champions like {{champion:157}}  and {{champion:55}}  preety hard with how his shield works. Though this is for close range mids. Against champs like brand he is a poor pick but yeah if you like the ability to just stay in fights for a REAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLY long time then go for {{champion:82}} . He is cheap and easy to learn as well
